title: League of Legends Won't Work.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When I was in queue for Ranked Solo / Duo, my client froze. I restarted the client and its said it needed to update it and the game would restart in 10 seconds. When this happened it went through and did the same thing over and over. So, I deleted the game entirely and downloaded it again. This reverted it back to the old client which I didn't have in place and said it needed to update. Once it was done updating it said the message in the image linked. So, now every time I open the client, it automatically downloads the new client but that message pops up and the process repeats.

                                                               If anyone could help me, it would be greatly appreciated.
                                                                                                  Thank you.

replies.body: I'd like to help but just need one more piece of detail to figure out what's happening.  At what % exactly are you getting this error?  Let me know!
At 99% then the message pops up.

Thanks for the info!  At 99% the patcher is trying to download game files and apply them, but a poor connection is causing it to back track and fail.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and grab those updates.  I hope that helps!
Thank you so much! Using the Hextech Repair Too, I was able to fix my game. <3
